hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y wget tar subversion openjdk-8-jdk
###Install Maven cd /home/test wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -xvzf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
###Get Alfresco Source code
cd /home/test svn co https://svn.alfresco.com/repos/alfresco-open-mirror/alfresco/COMMUNITYTAGS/5.2.g/ sed -i '31 s/^/\/\//' ./5.2.g/root/projects/solr4/source/java/org/alfresco/solr/AlfrescoSolrCloseHook.java
###Set Environment Variables export M2_HOME=/home/test/apache-maven-3.3.9 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$M2_HOME/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx1024m " java -version
#Build and Install Alfresco (Skipping Test cases) cd /home/test/5.2.g/root/ mvn clean install -DskipTests -fn
###Testing ( Optional ) cd /home/test/5.2.g/root/ mvn clean install -fn | tee testlogs
### Installing Tomcat cd /home/test sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk tar git make gcc ant export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin java -version
###Build OpenSSL cd /home/test rm -rf openssl git clone https://github.com/openssl/openssl.git && cd openssl && git checkout OpenSSL_1_0_2l && \ ./config --prefix=/usr --openssldir=/usr/local/openssl shared && \ make && \ sudo make install
###Build Tomcat cd /home/test rm -rf tomcat85 git clone https://github.com/apache/tomcat85.git cd tomcat85 git checkout TOMCAT_8_5_16 cp build.properties.default build.properties ant
ls /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects #cp /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects/web-client/target/alfresco.war /home/test/tomcat85/output/build/webapps/. #cp /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects/server-root/target/ROOT.war /home/test/tomcat85/output/build/webapps/. #cp /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects/solr4/target/solr4.war /home/test/tomcat85/output/build/webapps/. #cp /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects/solr/source/solr/instance/apache-solr-1.4.1.war /home/test/tomcat85/output/build/webapps/. #cp /home/test/5.2.g/root/projects/solr/target/solr.war /home/test/tomcat85/output/build/webapps/.
export CATALINA_HOME=/home/test/tomcat85/output/build export PATH=$PATH:$CATALINA_HOME/bin
cd $CATALINA_HOME/bin sh catalina.sh start
sleep 200s
###Verification of output rm -rf index.html
wget http://127.0.0.1:8080/
sleep 60s
sh catalina.sh stop
